name: EduRev
headline: Learning App for 400M Indian Students like a Netflix for Education
description:
EduRev is like a Netflix for Education with a layer of social networking. We want to make the process of education and learning so good that you (and your kids) don’t feel the need to go to a school/college/coaching. EduRev stands for Education Revolution and we are looking to achieve nothing less. 

EduRev has over 7 million students and adds around 10 new users each minute. We are backed by the iconic American VC Y Combinator, Artiman Ventures and even angel investors like Anand Chandrashekaran, Austen Allred, Martin Basiri to name a few. 

We won the Best App award (for learning) by Google, mBillionth award by Bill and Melinda Gates, and even won Startup of the Year by TieCon.

Android App: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.edurev
Website: http://edurev.in/
iOS App (beta): https://apps.apple.com/in/app/edurev/id1529835494
generated_description:
EduRev is shaking up the education landscape in India. Think of it as the Netflix for learning, aimed at the 400 million Indian students. Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's Winter 2020 batch, EduRev’s mission is simple yet ambitious: to revolutionize education so that students and even their parents feel they don’t need traditional schooling or coaching classes anymore. They want to make learning a joyful experience rather than a chore.

With over 7 million users and a staggering growth rate that sees 10 new users signing up every minute, it’s clear that EduRev is capturing attention. The company has garnered backing from prominent investors, including Y Combinator, Artiman Ventures, and notable angel investors like Anand Chandrashekaran and Martin Basiri.

EduRev has earned accolades for its user-friendly platform, receiving awards such as Best App for Learning from Google, the mBillionth award from the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation, and even Startup of the Year by TieCon. 

The platform's offerings are robust. It provides a plethora of resources across various subjects and competitive exams, boasting over 100,000 videos and 250,000 notes. Live classes, mock tests, and a community of fellow learners and educators enrich the educational experience. Plus, with more than 15 million questions available for practice, EduRev has left no stone unturned in preparing its students for success.

Located in Chandigarh with a dedicated team of 24, EduRev is broadening its reach not just within India but also in countries like Singapore, UAE, and Kuwait. Their platform covers every class from 1 to 12 and more than 50 competitive exams.

In a world where the cost of education can often be exorbitant, EduRev champions accessibility and affordability, believing that quality education shouldn't be limited to a privileged few.

For any student eager to learn effectively, EduRev is an avenue worth exploring. Whether through their [Android app](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.edurev), their freshly minted [iOS app](https://apps.apple.com/in/app/edurev/id1529835494) in beta, or the [website](http://edurev.in/), the tools are all laid out for a revolution in education—one click away.
